title: Oracle Integration Cloud (OIC) Developer
description: We are looking for an OIC developer to join our team. You will work on developing integrations in Oracle Integration Cloud (OIC), configuring OIC adapters, and using Oracle Visual Builder Cloud Service (VBCS) to build applications. If you have experience with Oracle SOA Suite and REST APIs, it will be a plus. We value creativity, passion, and teamwork.

title: Oracle Visual Builder Cloud Service (VBCS) Developer
description: We are seeking a VBCS developer to help us build modern web and mobile applications using Oracle Visual Builder Cloud Service (VBCS). You will use your skills in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and VBCS to build responsive and engaging applications. If you have experience with REST APIs and Oracle Integration Cloud (OIC), it will be a plus. We value innovation, attention to detail, and collaboration.

title: Oracle Cloud Application Architect
description: We are seeking an Oracle Cloud Application Architect to design and develop cloud-native applications on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI). You will have expertise in Oracle Cloud services such as Oracle Integration Cloud (OIC), Oracle Visual Builder Cloud Service (VBCS), and Oracle Functions, as well as cloud-native application design patterns and microservices architecture. We value strategic thinking, leadership, and technical excellence.

title: Oracle Integration Cloud (OIC) Solutions Architect
description: We are seeking an OIC Solutions Architect to design and implement end-to-end integration solutions using Oracle Integration Cloud (OIC). You will have experience with system integration, API design, security, and data management, and will be familiar with DevOps principles and cloud-native development practices. If you have experience with VBCS and Oracle SOA Suite, it will be a plus. We value problem-solving, innovation, and customer focus.

title: Oracle Visual Builder Cloud Service (VBCS) UI/UX Designer
description: We are looking for a VBCS UI/UX Designer to join our team. You will be responsible for designing and prototyping user interfaces for web and mobile applications using Oracle Visual Builder Cloud Service (VBCS) and modern front-end development technologies such as React and Angular. If you have experience with design systems and usability testing, it will be a plus. We value creativity, user empathy, and attention to detail.

title: Oracle Cloud Security Engineer
description: We are seeking a Cloud Security Engineer to ensure the security and compliance of our Oracle Cloud applications and services. You will have experience with cloud security best practices, vulnerability management, and identity and access management in Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) and related services. If you are familiar with Oracle Integration Cloud (OIC) and Visual Builder Cloud Service (VBCS), it will be a plus. We value integrity, critical thinking, and continuous learning.

title: Oracle Cloud Technical Consultant
description: We are seeking an Oracle Cloud Technical Consultant to provide technical expertise and guidance to our clients on Oracle Cloud services, including Oracle Integration Cloud (OIC) and Visual Builder Cloud Service (VBCS). You will have experience with cloud solution architecture, development, testing, and deployment, as well as excellent communication and problem-solving skills. We value customer satisfaction, teamwork, and commitment to quality.
